description: Loads emails from Gmail using OAuth 2.0 service account credentials. Extract and process email content with support for threads and conversation context.

json_string.display_name: JSON String of the Service Account Token
json_string.info: JSON string containing OAuth 2.0 access token information for service account access

label_ids.info: Comma-separated list of label IDs to filter emails (e.g., INBOX, SENT, UNREAD, IMPORTANT).

max_results.info: Maximum number of emails to load.

errors.from_email_not_found: From email not found in message headers.
errors.no_plain_text: No plain text part found in the email.
errors.response_email_not_found: Response email not found in the thread.
errors.invalid_json: Invalid JSON string provided for credentials.
errors.auth_refresh_failed: Authentication error: Unable to refresh authentication token. Please try to reauthenticate.

logs.loader_initialized: Gmail loader initialized - Max results: {max_results}, Labels: {labels}
logs.thread_context_added: Thread context added to chat session
logs.single_message: Processing as single message (not in thread)
logs.starting_lazy_load: Starting lazy load of emails from Gmail
logs.no_messages_found: No messages found with the specified labels.
logs.creating_credentials: Creating OAuth credentials from token info
